abstract: British pound falls to seven-year low as investors seek to insure against possible exit from European Union by Great Britain.

headline.print_headline: Pound Sterling Declines to a Seven-Year Low
headline.main: Pound Sterling Falls to a Seven-Year Low

snippet: Sterling sank to a seven-year low as investors rushed to insure themselves against a possible British exit from the E.U. after a June 23 referendum.
lead_paragraph: Sterling sank to a seven-year low as investors rushed to insure themselves against a possible British exit from the E.U. after a June 23 referendum.
